channel.title: Blog on Power Platform Portugal
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Power Platform Portugal

item.title: Approvals app now available on Microsoft Teams
item.description: Approvals in Microsoft Teams allows you to quickly and easily create, manage and share approvals directly from your hub for teamwork.

item.title: Power Virtual Agents support for Teams channel Single Sign-on is available in Public Preview
item.description: Power Virtual Agents (PVA) already supports Web channel SSO, and today we are announcing the Public Preview of PVA support for Teams channel SSO when using Azure AD.

item.title: Source code files for Canvas apps
item.description: Imagine using GitHub with a Canvas app. And I mean using GitHub as it was meant to be used, with text diffs between versions, and not just storing opaque .
